title: Assistant Branch Manager Job at Supersaver Supermarket
content:
Supersaver Supermarket, established in 2013, is Nigeria's fastest growing brand in the retail sector with branches in diffrent parts of Lagos and massive expansion plans in various parts of the Nigeria. Our businesses cut across retail trade, wholesale trade, manufacturing and Agriculture.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Branch Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Assist the Branch Manager in overseeing daily outletactivities
	Supervise and motivate staff to achieve branch performance targets
	Handle customer issues professionally and efficiently
	Ensure proper stock management and coordinate with procurement and inventory team
	Monitor compliance with company policies and operational procedures
	Contribute to staff training, scheduling, and general store management


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree
	At least 3 years of experience in retail, with 2 years in a supervisory or managerial role.
	Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work under pressure and adapt in a fast-paced environment
	Must be flexible to work shifts, weekends, and public holidays.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: supersaverhr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Manager Job at Rubels and Angels Food Court
content:
Rubels & Angels is a Fine Dining and Take out Restaurant redefining the food service industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Oversee daily restaurant operations to ensure smooth and efficient service.
	Manage staff recruitment, training, scheduling, and performance evaluations.
	Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction by maintaining service and food quality standards.
	Monitor inventory, order supplies, and manage vendor relationships.
	Handle customer complaints and resolve issues promptly and professionally.
	Monitor financial performance, including budgeting, cost control, and sales reporting.
	Enforce health, safety, and hygiene regulations to ensure a safe dining environment.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a BSc Degree with 2 - 3 years of experience. 
	Must reside within the axis of ago palace, lagos state.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: rubelsangels@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

title: Quality Control Officer Job at JMG Limited
content:
JMG Industries Limited is a diversified solution provider with a broad portfolio in power generation, electrical infrastructures, industrial equipment, elevators & escalators and HVAC solutions. With 20 years of experience in Africa and strong partnerships with some of the world’s leading brands, JMG combines global technologies and regional expertise to fulfill the development needs of the African market.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Control Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Carry out quality assessment measures of all raw materials
	Conduct visual and measurement tests, and rejecting and returning unacceptable materials
	Monitor operations to ensure that they meet production standards
	Approve in-process production by confirming required specifications, conducting visual and measurement tests, and communicating the required adjustment to the production supervisor
	Document and update inspection results by completing reports
	Approve all finished products by confirming specifications and conducting required test
	Remove and segregate all products that fail to meet specifications or defective and complete documentation
	Maintain safe work environment by following standards and procedures and complying with regulations
	Recommend improvement measures to the production process to ensure quality control standards are met.
	Carry out laboratory tests.


Requirement


	Must have experience in plastic production.


Salary
N120,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lagosproductionjobs@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

title: Account Officer Job at Vet etcetera Limited
content:
Vet etcetera Limited is a company that is into Integrated farming as well as veterinary cosmetic production.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
Job Location: Chikuku, Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Candidates must posses an OND/HND in Accounting.
	Relevant accounting certifications (added advantage)
	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and accounting software.


Salary
N70,000 - N100,000 Monthly.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications and CV to: anorued@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Design Architect Job at the Classroom by Ultimus
content:
The Classroom by Ultimus offers a full bouquet of ambiance fittings ranging from Decorative & Effect paints, Tiles, Sanitary wares, Smart Kitchens, Vanity wares, Chandeliers, Spotlights, wall scones, Table & Floor Lamps Faucets & Kitchen mixers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Design Architect
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Senior Project Architect

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	This role requires a right - brained revolutionary thinker who is willing to dare the impossible to create masterpieces.
	The position will require the production of schematic designs that are functional, safe, sustainable and aesthetically pleasing.
	You will also be involved in interior design development and execution, construction drawings preparation, design proposal schemes, construction documentation and leading project teams.


Main Duties and Responsibilities


	Developing 3D architectural and interior designs and ensuring effective execution of designs.
	Proceed with research and development of preliminary schematic designs to set the direction of the project
	Actively seeking new design and construction methods
	Reviewing of documents for quality control evaluations
	Meeting with clients to discuss project objectives, needs, and budget
	Work with the project manager and other project team members from the preliminary design and drawings stage to working drawing and execution.
	Ensure compliance with building codes and zoning regulations
	Preparing and presenting design proposals, including detailed drawings of finished buildings, renovations, or restorations
	Meeting with construction professionals and clients to discuss feasibility of designs
	Participate in site visits and project meetings
	Incorporate sustainable and energy-efficient design principles
	Working with contractors, surveyors, and building service engineers to create a construction schedule and bring the designs to fruition
	Working with computer-aided design software to create blueprints and images
	Participating in project management throughout the construction


Qualifications


	Architectural degree is required (B.Sc., M.Sc.)
	Licensed by recognised Architectural Body in Nigeria (ARCON)
	Minimum three years’ experience
	Proficient in standard industry software: Revit Architecture ,3D max studio + VRAY Sketchup + VRAY, AutoCAD, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe illustrator, Adobe InDesign, MS Office packages (Microsoft project inclusive).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and design Portfolio to: careers@theclassroom.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
